"Michela":
"Even over a transmission, that mighty roar
really reverberates deep into your soul."
"It's quite incredible how a sound can do that."

"Yes, yes... I think I understand. There's finally
a light at the end of the tunnel. "

"通信越しでもお腹の底まで響く
すさまじい咆吼ね。"

"心に届くという意味では
まさしくあれも素晴らしいものよ。"

"なるほど、なるほど。
方向性が見えてきた気がするわ。"
